a.n: The Morgenland Festival: The Art of Duo

p.k: The Morgenland Festival: The Art of Duo 2018. Kinan Azmeh, Rony Barrak, Jonas Burgwinkel & Michel Godard. Morgenland Festival, Osnabrueck, Germany
p.d: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. "The Art of Duo" presents an unprecedented duo featuring pianist Salman Gambarov and sheng player, a Chinese mouth-organ, Wu Wei.
